title: Killer Sudoku by Sudoku.com
intro: Killer Sudoku will let you enjoy an exciting experience! Jump into the new Sudoku gameplay, solve tons of new challenging number puzzles, and train your brain! Install Killer Sudoku now for free!  This free Killer Sudoku app comes from the developer of the world‚Äôs most downloaded classic Sudoku puzzle ‚Äì Sudoku.com. So a stellar experience, extra game quality, and endless fun are guaranteed.  Whether you‚Äôre a fan of classic Sudoku or just looking for a number game or math puzzle for a great time and mental workout, free Killer Sudoku is here for you.  Although Killer Sudoku seems a bit harder than classic Sudoku, we made it accessible for players of all skill levels. This number puzzle game comes with several difficulty levels ‚Äì easy, medium, hard, and expert Killer Sudoku. This way, Killer Sudoku puzzles are great for both beginners and advanced Sudoku solvers. We have no doubt you‚Äôll become a Killer Sudoku master in no time!  What is Killer Sudoku  Killer Sudoku is a true legend among number games and puzzles. In a nutshell, it‚Äôs a perfect blend of those fave brain-twisters Sudoku and Kakuro. Absolutely free!  This number puzzle goes by many names: Sumdoku, Addoku, Cross Sum, etc., but the rules are equally simple across the board. Your goal is to fill the grid with numbers like in classic Sudoku while making sure the sum of numbers in the cages (areas separated by dotted lines) is equal to the number in the upper left corner of that cage. Still sounds complicated? Let‚Äôs review the Killer Sudoku rules in detail.  How to play Killer Sudoku  ‚úì Fill all rows, columns, and 3x3 blocks with numbers 1-9 exactly like in classic Sudoku ‚úì Pay attention to the cages ‚Äì groups of cells indicated by dotted lines. ‚úì Make sure the sum of numbers in each cage is equal to the number in the upper left corner of the cage. ‚úì The basic rule of Killer Sudoku is that the sum of all numbers in each 3x3 block, row, or column always equals 45. ‚úì Numbers cannot repeat within cages, a single row, column, or 3x3 region.  Killer Sudoku features  ‚úì Complete free Killer Sudoku Daily Challenges to compete for awards ‚úì Take part in Seasonal Killer Sudoku Events and win unique medals ‚úì Challenge your logic figuring out where you went wrong, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes ‚úì Add notes if you‚Äôre not sure which number to place. Enjoy the experience of the classic paper-and-pen puzzle games. ‚úì Use hints when stuck on a really hard number puzzle. Don‚Äôt bother if you‚Äôre an experienced Killer Sudoku solver.  More Killer Sudoku features  - Statistics. Track your daily Killer Sudoku progress, best time, and other achievements - Unlimited Undo. Made a mistake? No worries, undo it in one tap - Color themes. Select classic Light, Dark, or Sepia themes to design your own Killer Sudoku kingdom! - Auto-save. If you get distracted and quit your Killer Sudoku game unfinished, we‚Äôll save it for you so you can continue anytime. - Eraser. Erase any mistakes you made in a number puzzle.  Killer Sudoku is now available on the vast majority of phones and tablets. Install Killer Sudoku for free, train your brain, and have fun along the way!
